name: Cookie Puzzle: Hexa
description:
Hexa cookies, classic games! Let's try this unique jigsaw puzzle game for FREE!

This is a unique block puzzle game created by Bigcat.

The rules are simple and suitable for people of all ages.
Move blocks to fill the graphics. There are many interesting graphics of different shapes!

HOW TO PLAY
. Drag the blocks to move them.
. Try to fit them all in the frame
. Blocks can't be rotated.

FEATURES
. Cookie-style interface
- Smooth feel, comfortable sound effects
- Easy to play, difficult to master

. TONS OF UNIQUE LEVELS
- Over 1000+ puzzles are unique and full of fun and amazing challenges!

. NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM!
- You can play offline in anytime.

SUPPORT UNIVERSAL APP
. Enjoy the game with various devices. (Phones and Tablets)

NOTES
. Cookie Puzzle: Hexa contains the ads like banner, interstitial, and reward video ads.

E-MAIL
